content:
Schedule an Appointment with an Enhanced Bot

Use the time selector messaging component with your bot to schedule appointments or deliveries within a bot conversation. The component works with an Apex class or flow to present customers with a selectable list of time slots and save their responses.

Required Editions and User Permissions:

Einstein Bots is available in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience.
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
To use enhanced Messaging channels with Enhanced Bots, view required editions.
Customize Application, Modify Metadata, or Manage Bots user permissions are needed to build and manage Einstein Bots.

Before you begin:
From the Messaging Component page in Setup, create a time selector messaging component.
Create an Apex class or flow that dynamically generates session-specific choices each time the component is sent.
Add the time selector component to your bot.
Specify a backup rule action for the bot to use if the required input parameters donâ€™t return any time slots to show to your customer.

Optionally, add repair attempts and resolve the issue according to your needs.
Save your changes.
title: Setting up a Time Selector with Einstein Bots
